definition: to turn on the water/to let water out/to throw a game (sports)
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: In early July 2010, the lake finally began flowing over the spillway.
sentences.chinese: 2010年7月初，堰塞湖终于通过泄洪渠开始放水。

sentences.english: The controlled release of water from reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 从水库中有节制地放水。

sentences.english: Today, my friends let me win at strip poker so I wouldn't take off my clothes.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我的朋友们在脱衣扑克游戏中放水让我赢了。

sentences.english: The lower the temperature, the more water, in order to prevent the freezing of the water pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 气温越低越要多放水，以防上下水管路冻堵。

sentences.english: To immerse in water after 72 hours.
sentences.chinese: 如需直接放水，须在72小时成膜固化后。

sentences.english: On the day the sluice gate was to be opened, a huge crowd gathered on the banks.
sentences.chinese: 在开闸放水的那一天，好些人来到了堤坝上。

sentences.english: I put no water in it.
After stopping dewatering, the intake electromagnetic valve is closed in delayed time.
sentences.chinese: 在停止放水后，延时关闭进水电磁阀。

sentences.english: Waterbird species number and individual density in ponds were higher during drawdown than those before and after drawdown.
sentences.chinese: 在放水过程中，养殖塘中水鸟的种类最多，密度最大。

sentences.english: Potatoes are peeled and chopped, and boiled in the port.
sentences.chinese: 将土豆去皮，切成小块，放水在锅里煮熟。

sentences.english: Soak agar agar until soft, section and cook in water until dissolved.
sentences.chinese: 用清水浸大菜至软身，切段，放水内煮至融透。

sentences.english: South Korean authorities have been careful to avoid explicitly labeling the release as a "water attack."
sentences.chinese: 韩国谨慎，一直指称开闸放水事件是一次“水攻”。

sentences.english: When the upstream reservoir discharged the water discontinuously, the danger of release liquid would be lowered.
sentences.chinese: 上游水库间歇非连续放水时，残油释放物危害小。

sentences.english: People also release water lanterns to guide water spirits.
sentences.chinese: 人们还会放水灯来指引水鬼。

sentences.english: Tokyo Fire Department uninhabited run water truck.
sentences.chinese: 东京消防庁无人走行放水车Dragon。

definition: cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to pour water into/to inject water into
to discharge water/to appear out of the water/to break the surface
to dry in the air/(fig.) to cold-shoulder
